subject: Basketball
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: Despite all the criticism she received for deciding to play on the Russian team at the Olympics, Becky Hammon said she had a positive experience in Beijing and had been received well upon her return.
snippet: Despite all the criticism she received for deciding to play on the Russian team at the Olympics, Becky Hammon said she had a positive experience in Beijing and had been received well upon her return.
